title: Where do I put my "I'm a Brand main and I have more comments" stuff?
body:
Because he is part of the mage update.

OK. Pyroclasm. Imagine Nami Q bounce effects.
Imagine it leaves an AOE fire puddle. Or Pillar leaves an aoe fire puddle that Pyroclasm gets a free bounce from.

I like the thought of using Conflagration to explode Sear mid flight. 

Brand should have reasons other than "let passive tick more" (aside from waiting for the best moment) for wanting to use his abilities later. 

Google Kio Kusanagi and watch his fiery crap.

replies.body: Probably the best place to put this is in Gameplay & Strategy or Player Creations and the NA Boards as I don't think game opinions are looked at as much over here.
